metadata.title: CVE-2020-36225 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was discovered in OpenLDAP before 2.4.57 leading to a double freeand slapd crash in the saslAuthzTo processing, resulting in denial ofservice.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36225` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ldap-utils - 2.4.42+dfsg-2ubuntu3.12
libldap-2.4-2 - 2.4.42+dfsg-2ubuntu3.12
slapd - 2.4.42+dfsg-2ubuntu3.12
slapd-smbk5pwd - 2.4.42+dfsg-2ubuntu3.12
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openldap package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.42+dfsg-2ubuntu3.12').
